description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update. If an existing instance is found and this flag is set there will be an error.

Spend_RestrictionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Spend_RestrictionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Spend_RestrictionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Spend_Restriction_Data.description: Reference to an existing Spend Restriction for update only purposes.
Boolean flag to indicate Spend Restriction is inactive.
Boolean flag to indicate Spend Restriction contains allowable costs.
Boolean flag to indicate Spend Restriction contains unallowable costs.

validation.validation: You must enter an object class set when the restriction type is Object Class.
Object class set can only be entered if the restriction type is Object Class.
You must select 1 or more restrictions.
Object class can only be entered if the restriction type is Object Class.
Spend category hierarchy, spend category, and pay component group can only be entered if the restriction type is Spend Category and Pay Component Group.
